content: free pattern can be found in my website https //littleloveeveryday com/boba-cat-amigurumi-pattern/ boba cat amigurumi pattern by a little love everyday this pdf pattern for boba cat amigurumi is written in us crochet terms and available in english skill level easy/intermediate the pattern requires basic crochet knowledge you should be familiar with - magic_ring - single_crochet - half_double_crochet - increase - invisible decrease - working in front and back loops - invisible fasten_off - slip_stitch materials you will need - sport weight cotton yarn in pink white and blue - 2 mm crochet hook or the size you need depending on yarn you use - polyester stuffing - 6 mm safety eyes/ flat back eyes - tapestry needle - small piece of cardboard - small amount of felt in brown/black colour - pipe cleaner optional size the finished doll measures around 5 inches tall and 2 5 inches wide you are welcome to use any yarn of different thickness the sizes may vary according to the yarn and hook you use >> this pattern is for personal use only you are not allowed to share publish resell distribute or rewrite this pattern in any way >> you may sell items made from this pattern but please give me a credit as the designer and include a link to this pattern >> kindly note this is an ad-free pdf pattern with step by step instructions and pictures of a pattern that s available in my website to see the free pattern go to www littleloveeveryday com hope you will enjoy crocheting this cute boba cat as much as i did
